• This method of anaesthesia will be associated with a high incidence of awareness. Counsel the patient with
respect to this if it occurs.
• If the skills exist to provide more complete and effective anaesthesia this description should not be followed.
• A stable, unruptured ectopic can be referred to a specialist  centre for medical or laparoscopic manag
